rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious entry with minimalistic decor, featuring a foyer that leads into the central courtyard and seamlessly transitions to other living spaces. Designed for natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open-plan area adjacent to the entrance hallway. Fitted with large windows to maximize daylight and views, aligning with Vastu principles for energy flow and minimalism.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A compact yet functional kitchen that adheres to minimalist design. Equipped with modern fixtures and efficient ventilation systems for a clean aesthetic.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An internal courtyard providing abundant natural light, ventilation, and a tranquil space within the apartment, designed in accordance with traditional Indian architectural aesthetics.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A utilitarian bathroom space that complements the overall minimalist design. It is positioned close to the central courtyard for optimal airflow and energy circulation.

openings.description: A sliding glass door facilitating unobstructed movement between spaces, promoting natural ventilation.
Large windows installed along the eastern facade to harness morning sunlight while ensuring cross-ventilation.
Each bedroom features a dedicated balcony, offering views over the landscape and access to natural light and air.
A skylight installation in the courtyard roof provides additional natural lighting and enhances energy flow per Vastu principles.
